summary.long: 1 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, concerning the Word of life—
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the life was manifested, and we have seen, and bear witness, and declare to you that eternal life which was with the Father and was manifested to us—
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: that which we have seen and heard we declare to you, that you also may have fellowship with us; and truly our fellowship is with the Father and with His Son Jesus Christ.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these things we write to you that your joy may be full.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: This is the message which we have heard from Him and declare to you, that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: My little children, these things I write to you, so that you may not sin. And if anyone sins, we have an Advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And He Himself is the propitiation for our sins, and not for ours only but also for the whole world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now by this we know that we know Him, if we keep His commandments.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him. By this we know that we are in Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Brethren, I write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Again, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who says he is in the light, and hates his brother, is in darkness until now.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
I write to you, little children,
Because your sins are forgiven you for His name’s sake.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
I write to you, fathers,
Because you have known Him who is from the beginning.
I write to you, young men,
Because you have overcome the wicked one.
I write to you, little children,
Because you have known the Father.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
I have written to you, fathers,
Because you have known Him who is from the beginning.
I have written to you, young men,
Because you are strong, and the word of God abides in you,
And you have overcome the wicked one.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For all that is in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Little children, it is the last hour; and as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have come, by which we know that it is the last hour.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; but they went out that they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you know all things.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Who is a liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist who denies the Father and the Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore let that abide in you which you heard from the beginning. If what you heard from the beginning abides in you, you also will abide in the Son and in the Father.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These things I have written to you concerning those who try to deceive you.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you will abide in Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And now, little children, abide in Him, that when He appears, we may have confidence and not be ashamed before Him at His coming.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If you know that He is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed on us, that we should be called children of God! Therefore the world does not know us, because it did not know Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, now we are children of God; and it has not yet been revealed what we shall be, but we know that when He is revealed, we shall be like Him, for we shall see Him as He is.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And everyone who has this hope in Him purifies himself, just as He is pure.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever commits sin also commits lawlessness, and sin is lawlessness.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever abides in Him does not sin. Whoever sins has neither seen Him nor known Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Little children, let no one deceive you. He who practices righteousness is righteous, just as He is righteous.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that He might destroy the works of the devil.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: In this the children of God and the children of the devil are manifest: Whoever does not practice righteousness is not of God, nor is he who does not love his brother.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: not as Cain who was of the wicked one and murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his works were evil and his brother’s righteous.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Do not marvel, my brethren, if the world hates you.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren. He who does not love his brother abides in death.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: By this we know love, because He laid down His life for us. And we also ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But whoever has this world’s goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: My little children, let us not love in word or in tongue, but in deed and in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And by this we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is His commandment: that we should believe on the name of His Son Jesus Christ and love one another, as He gave us commandment.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now he who keeps His commandments abides in Him, and He in him. And by this we know that He abides in us, by the Spirit whom He has given us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, do not believe every spirit, but test the spirits, whether they are of God; because many false prophets have gone out into the world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: By this you know the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and every spirit that does not confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God. And this is the spirit of the Antichrist, which you have heard was coming, and is now already in the world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They are of the world. Therefore they speak as of the world, and the world hears them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We are of God. He who knows God hears us; he who is not of God does not hear us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God abides in us, and His love has been perfected in us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as Savior of the world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And we have known and believed the love that God has for us. God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Love has been perfected among us in this: that we may have boldness in the day of judgment; because as He is, so are we in this world.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment. But he who fears has not been made perfect in love.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We love Him because He first loved us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If someone says, “I love God,” and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves God must love his brother also.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God, and everyone who loves Him who begot also loves him who is begotten of Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep His commandments.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For this is the love of God, that we keep His commandments. And His commandments are not burdensome.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: This is He who came by water and blood—Jesus Christ; not only by water, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who bears witness, because the Spirit is truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there are three that bear witness on earth: the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is the witness of God which He has testified of His Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now this is the confidence that we have in Him, that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin which does not lead to death, he will ask, and He will give him life for those who commit sin not leading to death. There is sin leading to death. I do not say that he should pray about that.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin not leading to death.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We know that whoever is born of God does not sin; but he who has been born of God keeps himself, and the wicked one does not touch him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies under the sway of the wicked one.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us an understanding, that we may know Him who is true; and we are in Him who is true, in His Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God and eternal life.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
verses.speaker: Narrator
